resource.chars:
The account of Cyclocylypeus is 
an original investigation of no 
less value - from its throwing a 
remarkable light upon the nature 
and relations of the ancient 
Nummulite -
Finally, the effectual overthrow 
which Dr Carpenter has given 
to M. D’Orbigny’s confused &
confusing system of classification 
is not the least of the merits of his 
paper -
Dr Carpenters illustrations are 
perhaps somewhat luxuriant
